name: Dracula's Castle Fanmade Remake (Alpha 2)
description: This is a remake of a game by Dave Microwaves Games. It is an action horror game known as Dracula's Castle. Wow, this took an extremely long time to make but I finally released alpha 2. This version contains twice as much content as the last version with 2 new floors to explore, resulting in 4 floors overall. I would consider this to have a full early game as well as a little mid-game. I have also implemented a new mechanic: the silver stake. This is a more powerful version of the regular stake that deals twice as much damage and can pierce through up to 3 enemies, making it extremely good at defeating big groups of enemies. There are about 45 minutes of gameplay depending on skill level.
